segments.text: I notice the woman drying the plate, completely unaware of the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her because she’s going to have a huge mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so mischievous, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like it’s perfectly safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see him falling backward any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently, like she’s used to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pooling everywhere, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
